Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அருளென்னும் அன்பீன் குழவி பொருளென்னும் செல்வச் செவிலியால் உண்டு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The child mercy which is borne by love grows under the care of the rich nurse of wealth.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A beautiful, divine child made of pure light, representing Grace/Mercy ('அருள்'). This child has just been born from a glowing heart, representing its mother, Love ('அன்பு').
Layered_Composition.Midground: The child of Grace is not left alone. It is being tenderly cared for, nurtured, and fed by a wealthy and kind nursemaid, who represents Wealth ('பொருள் என்னும் செல்வச் செவிலி').
Layered_Composition.Background: Because of the care of the wealthy nurse, the child of Grace is shown growing strong and healthy, able to perform its benevolent works in the world.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Grace is the child of Love, but it can only grow and thrive when it is nurtured by the 'wealthy nurse' of material resources.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The personification of Love, Grace, and Wealth is the central concept. Grace as a child, Love as its mother, and Wealth as its nurse creates a beautiful and clear family metaphor.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Nurturing, benevolent, tender, a beautiful synergy.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A soft, warm, and gentle light illuminates the scene. The child of Grace has a divine, pure white glow. The nurse of Wealth is adorned in rich but gentle colors, and her expression is one of loving care.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A tender medium shot, focusing on the loving interaction between the 'nurse' of Wealth and the 'child' of Grace.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a classical, painterly quality like a Renaissance 'Madonna and Child' painting.

Cultural_Anchors: Grace, the child of Love ('அருள் என்னும் அன்பீன் குழவி')
Wealth as the nurturing nurse ('பொருள் என்னும் செல்வச் செவிலி')
